source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static wide shot of the Tyrell Corporation pyramid from the film *Blade Runner*. A small flying vehicle, known as a spinner, slowly descends toward a landing pad at the very top of the massive, city-like structure. Another bright light, possibly a searchlight from another vehicle, sweeps across the sky from the right side of the frame.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: 1. The shot is not static; the camera is slowly moving forward.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: 1. The shot is not static; the camera is slowly moving forward.

generated_critique: The shot is not static; the camera is slowly moving forward. Additionally, a group of people can be seen walking near the base of the pyramid.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a slow forward-moving wide shot of the Tyrell Corporation pyramid from the film *Blade Runner*. A small flying vehicle, known as a spinner, slowly descends toward a landing pad at the very top of the massive, city-like structure. A group of people can be seen walking near the base of the pyramid. Another bright light, possibly a searchlight from another vehicle, sweeps across the sky from the right side of the frame.
